message: Let's start fair! I propose a 90/10 split.  You get the smaller share this time, but I'm sure you'll get a better deal in the future!
I think it's time we started valuing our contributions equally.  Let's split the money 95/5 this time, and see where things go from there.

I understand you're looking for a bigger share, Bob, but your offer was too unfair.  Let's compromise.  I'll take 40% and leave you 60% this time.  We can work out a more equitable split in the future.
